alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 9:44PM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga, Geauga and Ashtabula Inland counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times through late tonight. For Cuyahoga County, the heaviest snow will fall away from the lakeshore in the higher elevations of the eastern part of the county. Snow will diminish from west to east on Tuesday morning. Temperatures will fall into the 20s overnight with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
